channel.title: salt sensitivity on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in salt sensitivity on funPlantGenes

item.title: BK-PP2A
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g48150 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0555100 Gene Symbol: BK-PP2A Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnCKX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA02g05340D Gene Symbol: BnCKX5 Gene Name: Genome: Brassica v4.

item.title: CaFIRF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g30250 Gene Symbol: CaFIRF1 Gene Name: FAF1 Interacting RING Finger protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A pepper RING-finger E3 ligase, CaFIRF1, negatively regulates the high-salt stress response by modulating the stability of CaFAF1.

item.title: CaHDZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ12 Gene Name: Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor12 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: Chickpea WRKY70 Regulates the Expression of a Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor CaHDZ12, which Confers Abiotic Stress Tolerance in Transgenic Tobacco and Chickpea.

item.title: CcADF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CcADF9 Gene Name: Genome: C.

item.title: GhMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK5 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase5 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhMKK5 affects disease resistance, induces HR-like cell death, and reduces the tolerance to salt and drought stress in transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GmGPDH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmGPDH12 Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmGPDH12, a mitochondrial FAD-GPDH from soybean, increases salt and osmotic stress resistance by modulating redox state and respiration.

item.title: IbLEA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbLEA14 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis abundant 14 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Sweetpotato late embryogenesis abundant 14 (IbLEA14) gene influences lignification and increases osmotic- and salt stress-tolerance of transgenic calli.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: PalWRKY77
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PalWRKY77 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus alb Functional Descriptions: The PalWRKY77 transcription factor negatively regulates salt tolerance and abscisic acid signaling in Populus.

item.title: PutHKT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PutHKT2|1 Gene Name: high-affinity K+ transporter Genome: Species: Puccinellia tenuiflora Functional Descriptions: A high-affinity K+transporter PutHKT2|1|PutHKT2|1 cDNA was isolated from the salt-tolerant plant Puccinellia tenuiflora.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat TaGBF1 gene is involved in the blue-light response and salt tolerance.
